content:
Hi,

I was wondering if there is anyway a tool developer could inject a crate with implicit dependency to a crate compilation (like panic runtime injection: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/compiler/rustc_metadata/src/creader.rs#L753). The definitions of the injected crate would be used by a transformation pass later on.

Thanks,
or is there any other way to bring an extern dependency to scope when there is no explicit reference to it?
